actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, February 19, 2026,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, February 19, 2026, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN730-19:
        John DeLeeuw, of Texas, to be a Member of the National Transportation Safety Board for the remainder of the term expiring December 31, 2026

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Barrasso, at 3:39 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until  2 p.m. tomorrow.
